results.name: Ponte Wrap Dress
results.description:
Wrap dresses are big news this season, and the best news is that they flatter every figure. Our ponte style is tied with a grosgrain band, which is threaded through one side of the dress to secure it in place. Wear with heels for a smarter look, or dress down with white trainers.

80% viscose, 17% polyamide, 3% elastane

images.altText: Buy Ponte Wrap Dress - from The White Company

results.name: Eyelash Trim Blouse
results.description:
In our easy-care washed-satin fabric, this pretty blouse is detailed with delicate eyelash trim on the front. This feminine style has full-length sleeves with a slim cuff and bib detailing at the front. This versatile top is so easy to style – team it with black trousers for an office-to-out look, or opt for smart, skinny jeans for a smart-casual weekend look.

100% polyester

images.altText: Buy Eyelash Trim Blouse - from The White Company

results.name: Leather Skirt
results.description:
In a curve-flattering pencil-skirt shape, this knee-length skirt is made from butter soft New-Zealand lamb leather. It has panelled detailing and fastens with a concealed zip to the back and hook-and-eye closure. Designed to be worn on the natural waistline, this looks great with a slouchy knit or a high-neck blouse.

Concealed zip fastening
Hook & eye
closure
100% leather

images.altText: Buy Leather Skirt - from The White Company

results.code: CACHM - Cashmere Curve Hem Jumper - Dark Charcoal Marl
results.name: Cashmere Curve Hem Jumper - Dark Charcoal Marl
results.description:
Very Versatile V-Neck
Our pure-cashmere styles this season use a lighter 7-gauge knit to suit ‘in-between’ weather and give an airier feel that’s great for layering. Still using the same high-quality yarns sourced from Inner Mongolia, this style features a curved hem for a flattering finish when styled over trousers or jeans, and a V-neckline. Pointelle detail on the seams adds an intricate finish to this luxurious piece – layer it under a longline cardigan for that cocooning feeling on colder days.

Cashmere is by nature a delicate yarn and pilling is a natural side effect of this. We recommend purchasing our pilling comb to keep yours in beautiful condition. All of our 100% cashmere garments come with a zip-lock storage bag, essential for keeping your favourite pieces clean and protected all-year round, as well as protecting the garments from moths.

7gg loose-tension knit
Curved rib hem
V-neck
100% cashmere

images.altText: Buy Cashmere Curve Hem Jumper - Dark Charcoal Marl - from The White Company

results.name: Faux Fur Jacket
results.description:
Every woman should own a faux-fur jacket – far from just a glamorous eveningwear cover-up, you’ll be amazed at its versatility. This is lined in satin and has been made from super-soft and plush faux fur, in a hip-length cut that fastens centrally with hook-and-eye closures. It features concealed in-seam pockets and has a stand collar. Style yours with black denim and a blouse for a luxe-looking day-to-night look.

100% modacrylic

Back vent

The coolest way to wear the cardigan this season, our oversized, chunky-knit style is made from merino wool – making it thick and luxurious, but still lightweight to wear. results.name: Faux Fur Lined Parka
results.description:
We really do think we’ve created the perfect casual coat in this parka. Not only is it fully lined in thick, plush faux fur, but it can also be totally detached and worn as a lighter layer on warmer days, ensuring your get plenty of wear out of it, season after season. Three outside pockets and a gathered waist and hem add practicality and a flattering finish, while the hood is also fully detachable, with cleverly hidden poppers keeping the collar neat when worn without it. The ultimate all-season cover-up.

Detachable hood
Detachable lining

results.name: Cashmere Roll Neck Jumper - Cloud Marl
results.description:
Rest-Assured Roll-Neck
This softly spun roll-neck jumper is a must this season, and for many to come. Luxurious pure cashmere is knitted in a looser, giving it a beautiful light and airy feel that’s cool enough to wear in the Summer but also warm enough for cooler, Autumn days. Use this as a layering piece: over one of our Essential camis and under a coatigan or cardigan for a great ‘in-between-seasons’ look. We source all of our cashmere yarns from Inner Mongolia, before fibres go through as many as 40 processes to ensure they are as resilient, soft and high-quality as possible.

No Sweat Sweatshirt

It comes in our loose-tension 7-gauge knit, which we are using for Autumn to suit ‘in-between’ weather and give an airier feel. You’ll find casual sweatshirt detailing around the neckline and shoulder seams, plus herringbone detail on the raglan arm seams, making it a great pairing for casual denim or even crepe joggers this season.
